phrases: Piccolo is Resurrected By Super Shen Long.
His form is different than the one on Earth as well.
Thou who hast gathered the Dragonballs, now speak forth thy wish.
I shall grant thee any three wishes, as long as they are within my ability.
He really does grant three wishes!
We should have expected as much from the native Shenron!
It sure is generous of him!
Do not forget about Freeza and Vegeta!
Ask him to please bring back to life everyone that the Saiyajins killed on Earth.
Restoring the dead to life can only be accomplished one individual at a time.
Apparently, he can only bring back one person at a time.
If they only have three wishes... and there is me, Yamcha, Chiaotzu, and Piccolo...
I will have myself restored to life first.
Well, Kaio-sama, I will go first-
Do not be so selfish, I am going first!
I was the first one of us to die!
Therefore, I will be the first brought back!
You will use your telekinesis to cheat on us!
I shall grant thee any three wishes, as long as they are within my ability.
If we are found out by Freeza or Vegeta, we are finished!
Only one person can be brought back per wish!
For the native Shenron, he is not that generous after all!
You say you want to speak with Goku's son?
What are you planning to do, Piccolo?
What are you thinking of doing!?
You are not thinking of having just yourself brought back, are you!?
You are not the only one who is been training here!
We have also powered up several levels, you know.
Hurry and let me speak, please!
Place your hand on my shoulder, and then you can speak.
I am using Kaio to speak directly into your hearts.
I will not have you dishonor my name.
Kaio-sama is how I am addressed, Kaio-sama.
We know that you only have three wishes, and that only one person can be brought back to life per wish.
With the first wish, bring me back to life!
We will not let you get away with this, Piccolo!
Do not forget, if I am returned to life, Kami will be also.
When that happens, the Dragonballs on Earth will also be restored, and the rest of us here can then be brought back.
We can do it that way!
So that is what you were after.
Now, I will tell you the second wish...
Once I... Once I am brought back to life, bring me to Planet Namek, where you guys are!
I want to fight that rotten Freeza, who has killed my people, in the land where I was born.
I have gained great power since I have been here.
I will defeat him for you for sure!
Send me there to that planet you are on.
Do whatever you want with the third wish.
I will be so happy once you get here!
Have you forgotten the promise you made to me?
That you would never fight against Freeza?
I do not remember making such a promise.
Unfortunately, my memory is not that great.
How dare you do this to me!
I do not know what kind of punk you are, but I, Piccolo-sama, will be sure to defeat you!
You have no idea how terrible Freeza is!
I cannot talk to you like this!
Before we do anything else, let us get those two wishes granted!
- Yes? - Ask that Piccolo, the Nameksei-jin who was on Earth, be brought back to life!
It is an incredible battle power!
It will still take several more minutes for Kakarotto to fully recover.
It is still a bad time for Freeza to appear.
I got a bad feeling about this.
There is not supposed to be any night time on this planet.
So then why is the sky so dark?
I shall grant thy first wish.
Why you dirty rotten little brat!
What is that monster over there?
Is that the dragon they said would appear out of the Dragonballs?
Damn it, those rotten kids have gotten the jump on me!
Freeza is almost on top of us!
I am reading four life signs.
At last, I have found you!
Just you wait for what you have got coming, you inferior life forms!
I am counting on you, Gohan!
I will not be responsible for this!
It is out of my hands now!
Popo, you have taken good care of the place in my absence.
I have granted your first wish.
Now, speak forth thy second wish!
The second wish is to have Piccolo, who was just restored to life, transported here to Planet Namek.
I shall grant your second wish.
I have granted thy second wish.
You may now speak thy final wish.
But Piccolo is not here yet.
You just said to have him brought to this planet... so he could be anywhere.
Did you mean you wanted him brought here?
We could use the third wish to bring him-
I knew it was something like this!
How dare you try to trick me, Vegeta-sama, you punks!!?
You have taken the only chance we had to defeat Freeza and wasted it!
The only way we can win is if I am made immortal.
We have only had two wishes granted so far, there is still one wish that remains to be granted.
I am quite relieved to hear this.
What is that column of light there?
That Is where the life sign readings are...
They could not be using the Dragonballs to get their wish!
Hurry up and do it now!
Do not you know what Do it now means!?
You have to do it right now!
But we do not have any other choice!
Father's injuries will not heal for some time still...
Then it is no wonder I feel such an odd nostalgia for this place.
The Nameksei-jin blood that flows within me must be responsible.
Hold on, this is no time to be so sentimental.
I would better locate Gohan and the others.
They are not around here anywhere close.
I can feel a tremendous Ki off in the distance.
Can that be the monster, Freeza?
There are three other Kis near there.
I still await thy final wish.
Do you want to be killed by Freeza?
Vegeta may be incredibly bad, but at least he is better than Freeza.
I hate to have to do this,
but right now, there is no other way to get us out of this pinch.
This will fix it so that Freeza will not be able to kill me.
I just have to keep after him, and even if I cannot do it now, eventually I will defeat him!
Very soon now, the time will come when I, Vegeta-sama, will rule the universe!
Why did the dragon disappear, and the sky become light again?
Why have the Dragonballs turned into those stones?
The life of the Senior Elder-sama, who created these Dragonballs, has come to an end.
What do you mean, you little snot!?
What about my... what am I supposed to do about my immortality!?
What do you want me to say?
If you had not double-crossed me, none of this would have happened!
You have really done it now, have not you, gentlemen?
You have done an outstanding job of shattering my dreams of eternal youth.
I certainly trust that you fools are now prepared to pay the price.
It is the worst possible situation...
In this great crisis, what will happen with Piccolo?
